content:
<think>
The user has greeted me in Chinese ("你好呀" which means "Hello" or "Hi there"). According to the system reminder, I should respond in Chinese since the user submitted a query in Chinese. I should acknowledge their greeting and ask how I can help them today.
</think>
你好！很高兴见到你！我是心流CLI，专门帮助你完成各种软件工程任务。
我可以协助你进行代码开发、调试、分析和优化等工作。请告诉我今天需要我帮你做什么吧！
